inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of sickle cell disease (electrophoretic documentation of SS, SC, or S beta-thalassemia genotype is required)
inclusion.label: unknown
met
inclusion.evidence: baseline saturation high 80's to low 90's on this therapy

exclusion.criterion: Significant renal insufficiency (patient on hemodialysis or estimated creatinine clearance less than 30% of normal)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient to f/u with pulmonology to start sildenifil chronically as outpatient as prior authorization is obtained.
